name: The First Cut is the Deepest

quests.name: The First Drop
quests.description: Every aspiring blood mage should make these three items first.  The Blood Altar is the block in which all early-game mod items are made.  To use it, make a sacrificial knife and right click it near the altar.  This will hurt you for 1 heart and fill the altar by 200LP.  Keep right clicking till you have 2000LP in the altar, then right click a diamond on the filled altar.  You will see particles, and after a while, the diamond will absorb the 2000LP you put in, and become a weak blood orb.  Once you have that, right-click to bind it to you with a little health.  You will now be able to slot the orb into a altar, whereupon it will suck the blood into your soul network, where it can be used for everything else related to the mod.  PSA - there's no way to get the blood back into the altar, so be careful!

tasks.longDescription: Craft a Blood Altar and a Sacrificial Daggar

quests.name: Runes
quests.description: Blood Runes and all varieties are what allows the player to upgrade their Blood Altar. Speed Runes make the Blood Altar run faster.

tasks.longDescription: Craft 8 blank blood runes, and then one speed rune + one efficiency rune. See ftbwiki.org/Blood_Altar for a guide on how to upgrade your Blood Altar

quests.name: Is it Sadism or Masochism?
quests.description: Make the stuff available with a tier 2 altar

tasks.longDescription: The Rune of Sacrifice makes mobs killed with the Dagger of Sacrifice give the Altar more Life Essence, and the Rune of Self-Sacrifice makes players using a Sacrificial Knife give more Life Essence
The Sacrificial Knife uses the players blood to give the Altar Life Essence. Using the Daggar of Sacrifice, you can kill mobs to fill nearby Blood Altars.

quests.name: Now Things Get Interesting
quests.description: The Magicians Blood Orb is the third tier of Blood Orb, made by putting a Block of Gold into a Tier 3 Blood Altar.

quests.name: Multiblocks Forever
quests.description: The Ritual Diviner is a tool to help with the construction of Blood Magic Rituals.Shift right clicking the diviner will cycle through the available rituals. The tooltip will display the number and type of Ritual Stones required to build the selected ritual.Right clicking on a Master Ritual Stone with the diviner will place and ink the ritual stones needed for the ritual. Placing a stone will use Life Essence, a ritual stone from the user's inventory and will cause the diviner to animate and emit green particles.The ritual diviner will not replace existing blocks. If it tries and fails to place a stone it will animate but will not emit any particles. The mage will need to clear out the obstruction for placement to continue. Snow, tall grass and torches are common, yet easily overlooked, obstructions.When the ritual diviner has finished building a ritual, right clicking it will cause no animation.There are two tiers of diviner, one which can not place dusk runes and one which can. There is a tooltip that indicates the tier of a diviner. Attempting to build a ritual that requires dusk runes with the diviner that can't place them will cause it to act as if the ritual is complete when it is not.

tasks.longDescription: Craft an Imperfect Ritual Stone, a Master Ritual Stone, and a  Ritual Diviner

quests.name: A Demon's Weapon
quests.description: The Bound Blade is created by binding a soul to a diamond sword in a Ritual of Binding. It has the ability to apply a special type of weakness, which is important in Blood Shard Harvesting. It deals twelve hearts of damage and is highly enchantable. The sword costs 50LP per swing, and uses 50LP every 4 seconds to stay activated. The Energy Blaster is a ranged weapon created with the Ritual of Binding by binding a soul to an apprentice blood orb. To use, it must be bound to the player with a right-click. It is activated with a shift+right-click. Each shot costs 200LP, and the Blaster, like all bound tools/weapons, uses 50LP every 4 seconds. Any mob hit will get a Weakness III de-buff, crucial for the collection of Weak Blood Shards and Demon Blood Shards.

tasks.longDescription: - Have a Bound Sword and Energy Blaster.

quests.name: God Damn It, I Right Clicked
quests.description: The Bound Pickaxe is a tool added by Blood Magic. It has the same mining level as a Diamond Pickaxe, but is slightly faster, and has infinite durability. Standard mining with left click costs 5 LP per block. When right clicked it consumes 10,000 LP and mine out a 11x11x12 area around the user. Be extremely careful not to right click when attempting to sneak right click. The Bound Axe consumes 100 LP per block when used as a normal axe. It can also be right clicked to consume 10,000 LP and cut any wooden blocks in a 13x13x13 area around the block clicked. Standard digging with left click costs 250LP/block. When right clicked it drains 10,000 LP from your network and destroys a 13x13x13 centered around the block clicked.

quests.name: To Be a Master
quests.description: The fourth tier of Blood Orb. To get it, you must get a Weak Blood Shard by killing mobs with a Bound Blade. Put this into a Tier 4 Blood Altar

quests.name: Oceans of Blood
quests.description: The Rune of Augmented Capacity is an upgrade component for the Blood Altar. Each one increases the capacity of the Altar by 2,000 LP.With more than 14 runes dedicated to capacity, it is more efficient to use Runes of Superior Capacity. Each Rune of Dislocation increases the speed at which Life Essence can be pumped into or out of the altar by 20%. This bonus is multiplicative: two runes will increase the speed 44%, three increases by 72% and so on. Each Rune of the Orb increases the amount of LP that can be transferred into a Soul Network by 2% of its original value. For the Weak Blood Orb this is 100 LP per rune, but for the Archmage's Blood Orb it is 200,000 LP.

tasks.longDescription: Craft 1 each of augmented capacity/dislocation/orb runes.

quests.name: Rituals of the Dusk
quests.description: Lots of rituals need dusk runes.  This is as soon as you can get it, and this is very important.

tasks.longDescription: Craft the Ritual Diviner that can place dusk runes.

quests.name: Let's Hope They Don't Miss Fred
quests.description: To use the Forge, place it on a vertical or horizontal surface. Then place Filled Sockets in the world around the Forge as if making standard armor in a crafting table. Then right-click the Forge and the piece of armor will be created.

quests.name: Devil's Drink
quests.description: To create an item with the chemistry set, place the ingredients in the five slots surrounding the middle and a Blood Orb in the lower right slot. Some recipes require higher tier orbs than others. The output will be placed into the middle slot. The chemistry set will drain Life Essence from the Soul Network and produce the item. While it is operating, it will emit red particles. To make the blood orb functional, you must right click to drain your life, similar to when using a sacrificial orb and a blood alter.

quests.name: Trial By Combat
quests.description: Summoning demons in Blood Magic requires that the player build a particular layout of Arcane Pedestals surrounding an Arcane Plinth and place particular ingredients atop the pedestals with a Master Blood Orb on the plinth. If done correctly, the ingredients will be consumed — except the Blood Orb — and a demon will be summoned. Summoning a demon requires that the player place a particular set of items upon the pedestals surrounding the Arcane Plinth. The items may be placed in any order and position. Placing an item onto a pedestal functions identically to placing items in a Blood Altar- right click with the item in hand to place it on the pedestal. The player may also remove items from the Arcane Pedestal or Arcane Plinth by right clicking it with an empty hand.In addition to the required ingredients, each demon requires that a Blood Orb be placed atop the Arcane Plinth. The Blood Orb can be placed at any time during the summoning process, or simply left atop the Arcane Plinth between summons.If the items were placed correctly lightning will strike each pedestal in turn, consuming the placed items as it strikes. When all items are consumed, the Arcane Plinth will be struck with lightning and the demon will be summoned.

quests.name: Elemental Fury
quests.description: Elementals are summoned by placing six of a particular alchemical ingredient upon the six inner pedestals.Elementals are the only demon to drop Demon Blood Shards, required to make an Archmage's Blood Orb.All Elementals are capable of flight, and each has a combat ability unique to its elemental type. Being a tier 1 demon, Elementals have 100 HP.

quests.name: On to the Summit
quests.description: The fifth tier of Blood Orb requires a Tier 5 Blood Altar, and a Demon Blood Shard

quests.name: Because Bazooka
quests.description: The Energy Bazooka is a stronger version of the Energy Blaster. This weapon uses 20,000 LP to fire a two-staged projectile. The primary projectile explodes into 20 secondary projectiles when it hits something. The secondary projectiles will rebound and explode on impact.

quests.name: Knowledge is Power
quests.description: When used, this sigil displays the amount of Life Essence in the bound player's Soul Network. It can also display the tier and amount of Essence in a Blood Altar. While held, the Soul Network display bar is shown on the upper left portion of the screen.

quests.name: Got Lava?
quests.description: When used, the Sigil will create a lava source block in the world or add 1 bucket of lava to a tank.

quests.name: Moar Water
quests.description: When used, this Sigil can either create one water source block in the world or put 1 bucket of water into a tank.

quests.name: Swifter Sweeper
quests.description: When used, this Sigil will either remove one source block from the world or remove one bucket of liquid from a tank.

quests.name: Rapid Fire Fisticuffs
quests.description: When activated, the Sigil grants the user the Haste buff, increasing mining and digging speed by 20%.

quests.name: Double Jump
quests.description: When used, the Sigil will boost the user in the direction they are facing. It can also be held down to fly in the direction the cross-hair is aimed.

quests.name: The Yin to the Yang
quests.description: This Sigil has two abilities: 1) Right clicking directly on a plant will apply bone meal to that plant. 2) Right clicking while not on a plant will activate the Sigil which will cause accelerated growth on nearby plants around the user.

quests.name: You Should Get New Ones
quests.description: When activated, the Sigil will provide damage protection from Water (drowning), Fire/Lava, and Falling.

quests.name: Minecraft Is Not A Platformer
quests.description: When active, this Sigil creates 5x5 platform of Spectral Blocks centered at the users feet. Spectral Blocks outside of the 5x5 platform will vanish after 5 seconds. These blocks can be broken instantly with a left click and right clicking on one with a block will replace the Spectral Block with the one used. This can be used to build mid-air.

quests.name: Too Many Sigils
quests.description: The Sigil of Holding allows the user to store up to four other sigils inside of it. Shift right-clicking the Sigil will take any Sigils inside the players inventory and will store them inside for future use. Shift right-clicking the Sigil of Holding while other Sigils are inside it will scroll through the stored Sigils.

quests.name: Can't...Quite...Reach...
quests.description: When Active, the Sigil of Magnetism pulls in any loose item in the world to the users inventory within a 5 block radius.

quests.name: Let There Be Light
quests.description: When used, will fire a projectile which becomes a Blood Light when it hits a block. This creates a light source on that block as well as does a small amount of damage to mobs and will sometimes set them on fire.

quests.name: That's No RoadRunner
quests.description: While activated, this Sigil provides the Boost buff to the user. This buff increases the player's movement speed, jump height, and grants step assist.

quests.name: Bye Bye Lava
quests.description: When activated, the Sigil temporarily removes any fluid blocks within a 5 block radius. Once it is disabled, or the user moves out of range, the blocks will be replaced. It works on any fluid that uses the Forge fluid API (Water, Lava, etc).

quests.name: Those Damn Skeletons
quests.description: When active, this Sigil deflects projectiles/arrows fired at the user.

quests.name: Weaksauce Weakness
quests.description: The simplest potion reactants

quests.name: Bud Lite Factory
quests.description: For those with bad taste

quests.name: Reagents Proper
quests.description: Same thing, but better

quests.name: 21 Run Time
quests.description: CHUG CHUG

quests.name: 200 Proof
quests.description: Drunk on power

quests.name: Connuisseur Alert
quests.description: If I do not like it, I do not swallow...

quests.name: The Simple Stuff
quests.description: These are the simplest possible spells

quests.name: Oboy, This Is Going To Be Trick
quests.description: Craft the first-step items

quests.name: I Hope This is Worth it
quests.description: The blocks that you actually place down to make chains

quests.name: And it Comes Together
quests.description: Explain how to use the blocks you just made to create a spell.
